name: 安娜-索菲·古塞
awards: 2023年 第73届柏林国际电影节 新生代儿童单元 国际评审团最佳短片 (提名) 姐妹之间
name_full: 安娜-索菲·古塞 Anne-Sophie Gousset
introduction: After studying at the École Émile Cohl in Lyon, she developed the interactive children’s story Le Caïmansonge. She then studied editorial design in Annecy. She illustrates interactive stories, makes commissioned animations and works as a writer for videogames. Entre deux sœurs, which she co-directed with Clément Céard and for which she is also responsible as the writer and graphic designer, is her first short film as a director.
